item.title: 2022-06 desktop pc hardwere specs
item.description: #tech/hardware Processor:: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor 3.6 GHz RAM:: 32 GB Graphics:: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Motherboard:: ASUS ROG STRIX B450-F GAMING Keyboard:: Keychron Mouse:: Logitech MX Master 3 Headphones:: DT 990 PRO 250 OHM Microphone:: maono
